Houston.McGovern Centennial Gardens:
McGovern Centennial Gardens is a collection of gardens in Hermann Park, in Houston, Texas, United States.


== Hawkins Sculpture Walk ==

The Hawkins Sculpture Walk features busts of notable figures, including:

McGovern also includes the statues: Confucius (2009), Dawn (1971), Mahatma Gandhi (2004), and Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
